name: Curried Tuna Salads for Verrines
description: ‘Verrine’ comes from verre, the French word for glass. A Verrine is an impressive appetizer or dazzling dessert elegantly presented in a small glass.

ingredients.name: very thin slices of Granny Smith apple

preparation: Whisk together mayonnaise and Mango Curry Dip Mix. Stir in tuna and diced apple.
Using a fork, gently pile tuna mixture over lettuce. Sprinkle with red bell pepper and garnish with apple slices.
tips: Serving Suggestion: Dish up with crackers or melba toast rounds.
